text: Kenne Fant (born Carl-Henrik Fant; 1 January, 1923 – 30 May, 2016) was a Swedish actor, director and writer. He was born in Strängnäs. He was known for his roles as Göran Thome The Most Beautiful on the Earth (1948) and as Arne in Prison (1949). He directed the movie Adventures of Nils Holgersson (1962). Fant died on 30 May, 2016 in Stockholm, Sweden at the age of 93. ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish writers Category:Swedish movie directors
title: Kenne Fant
